appetizers.name: Jalapeno Poppers
appetizers.description: Jalapenos with cream cheese and cheese, breaded and fried.

cold sandwiches.name: Ah, Ah, Ah, Ah, Stayin' a Chive
cold sandwiches.description: Roast beef sandwich with green onions.

cold sandwiches.name: Olive-R Twist
cold sandwiches.description: Our Sir Lanshallot sandwich with olives.

hot sandwiches.name: Sweet Dreams are Made of Cheese
hot sandwiches.description: Garlic bread grilled cheese with 4 cheeses

desserts.name: Virgin's Breasts
desserts.description: Round pastries in the shape of a small breast, with an outer layer of pasta frolla (shortbread dough) and a cream filling flavored with chocolate and candied orange peel.

desserts.name: Nun's Farts
desserts.description: It's basically just flaky pie crust rolled up with a gooey paste of butter, brown sugar, and cinnamon.

desserts.name: Sex in a Pan
desserts.description: This sinfully rich layered dessert has layers of cream cheese, whipped topping and two kinds of pudding on a simple baked shortbread crust.

drinks.name: Short Trip to Hell
drinks.description: Made with  peach, strawberry, and wild berry Schappps the drink is finished with a can of Red Bull and a shot of Jagermeister.

drinks.name: Fearless Redneck
drinks.description: A mix of Jim Beam Black Label Bourbon and Sobe No Fear energy drink

drinks.name: The Drunken Elf
drinks.description: This mixed drink features Bacardi Golden Rum combined with pink lemonade with a candy cane to decorate the glass.
